channel.title: I have created a npc and in npchandler.java i make him say

item.title: I have created a npc and in npchandler.java i make him say
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1484) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "New update type ::shadegame for a new mini game"; }

That should work.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lol_range01 lol range01
item.description:
@lol_range01 wrote:

errors il post right nowi got this error
and il post ho everything look in my folder cause im geting confued

[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 06:12:06 PM[/size][hr]

if (npcs[i].npcType == 29) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome everyone"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1468) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Shop here anyone?"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 797) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); npcs[i].textUpdate = "Players Online: " + players; } } 
									if (npcs[i].npcType == 1451) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
					}
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 847) {
					if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Are you brave enough to dare the minigame?";
					}
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2203) {
					if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Click that glowy thing to claim your prize, *hic*...";
					}
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 847) {
					if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Click the sacks over there to start!";
					}
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 942) {
					if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Almost done, use the key drop on the tunnel!";
					}
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 942) {
					if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Coded by Newb 2341, get your prize!";
					}
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 33) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
					}
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 37) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to tzhaar caves";
					}
				}
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 28) { // dude to tele you from tzhaar - TEMP
					if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to varrock";
					}
					}
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 535) { // fairy - white armour shop keper
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "White Armour Shop here!";
					}
				}
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 209) { // nulodian - black armour shopkeeper
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Black Armour Shop here!";
					}
				}
				
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1201) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "DO YOU DARE ENTER THE BLACK DRAGONS LAIR?";
					}
				}
				
				if (npcs[i].npcType == 1199) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "GO THROUGH THIS DOOR TO TELEPORT TO THE BLACK DRAGON CAVE";
					}
				}
				
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2301) {
					if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Tele to the monkey training area";
					}
				}
                          if (npcs.npcType == 2475) {
              if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
                 npcs.updateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
                 npcs.textUpdate = "Welcome to EyreScapPK";
              }

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1484) {
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “New update type ::shadegame for a new mini game”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2168) {
if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Get your Team Capes here!!!”;
}
}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552)
{
if (misc.random2(50) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “GET YOUR HOLIDAY STUFF HERE! HO HO HO”;
}
}
else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000)
{
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“admin”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Admin is ONLINE”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Admin is OFFLINE”;
}
}
}

item.title: I have created a npc and in npchandler.java i make him say
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Make this:

if (npcs.npcType == 2475) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "Welcome to EyreScapPK"; }

Look like this:

if (npcs.npcType == 2475) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "Welcome to EyreScapPK"; } }

Santy, gtfo, you don’t know Java. I actually would like to let you know that my code didn’t affect him. It was already his doing that got him the error. Lets input what you wanted him to put in his NpcHandler, and see how many errors that gives him. Is that ok with you?

Edit: Wow Santy, look how much your codes would’ve helped him!

item.title: I have created a npc and in npchandler.java i make him say
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Replace it with this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1484) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "New update type ::shadegame for a new mini game"; } }

Should work.

Btw, Santy, that’s way off…

item.title: I have created a npc and in npchandler.java i make him say
item.dc:creator: @Santy Santy
item.description:
@Santy wrote:

if (npcs.npcType == 1484) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) } npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "New update type ::shadegame for a new mini game"; }
or it could be

if (npcs.npcType == 1484) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdate = "New update type ::shadegame for a new mini game"; }
